title: Responsive Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website designed and developed using React.js to showcase my skills and projects. The website is fully responsive and optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.

title: Maruti 800 EV Conversion
description: A project focused on converting a Maruti 800 into an electric vehicle. The project involved mechanical modifications, battery integration, and electrical system design to create a sustainable and eco-friendly vehicle.
